item.title: Introduction to the Linux command Line
item.description: Intro to the command line One of the most powerful tools while using Linux is the Linux command line . Because you see Linux was never meant to be used as a desktop . In the Initial days of Linux it was completely used without a graphical interface right in the server room . Thats why the linux command line is so powerful. Before talking about anything we need to get some basics in place
